items.sentence: One man\'s misfortune is another man\'s fortune.
Do you think Tom might have a problem with that?
Do you think Tom speaks French better than Mary?
Do you think Tom was satisfied with the results?
Do you think Tom would like it if Mary did that?
Do you think it might not have been an accident?
Tom and I usually speak to each other in French.
Tom and Mary like walking together in the woods.
Tom and his friends made a bonfire on the beach.
Tom asked Mary how to say "thank you" in French.
Tom asked Mary if she could make him a sandwich.
Tom asked Mary if she wanted something to drink.
Something happened here, but I don\'t know what.
Spending time with your children couldn\'t hurt.
Studying when you\'re sleepy is a waste of time.
That part of the story wasn\'t very interesting.
I have a friend whose father is a famous writer.
I have come in response to your ad in the paper.
Tom is the only one who didn\'t want to do that.
Wasn\'t Tom supposed to do that on October 20th?
